metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5686 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.9.0.

notes.Note: sbeattie> upstream asserts that it is an OOB read when disassembling an instruction, and thus does not have any security impact (beyond perhaps a denial of service for someone performing analysis of malware).

criterions.comment: radare: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
